0.text: Bug 31950  StyledText - Shift+UP broken in StyledText control.

1.text: In 2.1, StyledText (I assume) was changed to remember the horizontal location  of the cursor as the user presses UP and DOWN arrow keys.

2.text: This is great for  general navigation (thanks).

3.text: But this remembered location should be forgotten  when selecting text with the Keyboard.

4.text: StyledText is not showing platform  behavior.

5.text: STEPS: <Given the following scenario, including blank lines>  String <<CARET>>value = "abc"; </End scenario>  With the caret in the location indicated, press UP key, then SHIFT+DOWN.

6.text: The  expectation is that only the blank line is selected.

7.text: Instead, the blank line  and the beginning of the next line up until the cached location is selected.
